column4: i seem to have a problem... i am trying to compile mplayer, but during the configuration, it cannot seem to find my inttypes.h (i cannot either, to be quite honest), where do i find it?
you know mplayer is in the multiverse repository?
yes, i do...i just like to compile it, i tend to always do that
what does that mean?  where did you get the source :P
so did you just download the tarball for v1.0pre7try2 right?  you didn't issue some cvs commands in a terminal?
ok... 'll assume you are using v1.0pre7try2 .  Can you pastebin the output?
... how do i pastebin...? just copy and paste?
yeah just copy and apste to http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/ and give us a link
the version of mplayer you have only compiles with gcc-3.4 iirc.  Have you install gcc-3.4?
sudo aptitude install build-essential gcc-3.4, you need both of those to build it
